level.heading: AWARD AND DISBURSEMENT OF ASSISTANCE (ยง 1-2409)

level.text: The Administrator shall award loans to participants to the extent funds are available in accordance with the criteria in section 2408.
The Administrator shall disburse the first payment for each loan within ninety(90) days after the application is approved and the loan is awarded.

The Administrator shall disburse loan payments to participants in semi-annual installments to the extent funds are available, in accordance with the criteria in section 2408, until repayment of the eligible debt is complete, the maximum amount of loan repayment assistance stated in ยง 2403.8 is reached, or the participant no longer meets the eligibility requirements stated in ยง 2404, whichever occurs first.
